name: floodresponsemw
description:
Field-level data on rural water point status and functionality
across Malawi, collected during the USAID Flood Response initiative
(2019-2020). Includes GPS locations, flood impact indicators, pump
functionality, water quality measurements, and microbial contamination
data from mWater mobile assessments.

publisher.name: openwashdata @ Global Health Engineering, ETH Zurich
